tool_description: Generates unique invoice numbers following customizable numbering schemes and series management for proper invoice tracking and organization.

prefix.description: Prefix to add before the invoice number

include_year.description: Whether to include year in the invoice number

error_messages: Invalid numbering scheme: Scheme must be sequential, date-based, or prefix-sequential. Choose a valid numbering option.
Starting number invalid: Starting number must be a positive integer greater than 0. Provide a valid starting number.
Prefix format error: Prefix contains invalid characters. Use only alphanumeric characters and hyphens.
Number generation failed: Unable to generate unique invoice number. Check series settings and try again.
usage: Optionally specify numbering_scheme, prefix, starting_number, and whether to include_year. The tool will generate the next available invoice number in the series.

next_sequence.description: Next number in the sequence for tracking purposes

number_format.description: Format pattern used for number generation
